showScoreExcerpt:
A Strange Loop was startling enough when it premiered in 2019 at Playwrights Horizons. At the Lyceum, it feels like a seismic event. When was the last time Broadway saw a musical as brazenly original and brutally candid as this? Never, probably; shows this iconoclastic and accomplished usually remain hidden away, far from the tourist trade -- if they exist at all

Read more
